publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-962# Shona Robison: Travel Dundee-That the Parliament notes with concern the actions of Travel Dundee in removing or reducing the bus services on certain routes in Dundee; believes that this reduction in service will affect many people without access to a car, particularly the elderly, and urges Travel Dundee to reconsider this decision as a matter of urgency.
S1M-962# Travel Dundee (lodged on 6 June 2000) Tommy Sheridan*, Alex Neil*

S1M-962# Shona Robison: Travel Dundee-That the Parliament notes with concern the actions of Travel Dundee in removing or reducing the bus services on certain routes in Dundee; believes that this reduction in service will affect many people without access to a car, particularly the elderly, and urges Travel Dundee to reconsider this decision as a matter of urgency. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan, Alex Neil
S1M-962# Travel Dundee (lodged on 6 June 2000) Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Andrew Wilson*
S1M-962# Travel Dundee (lodged on 6 June 2000) Irene McGugan*

S1M-962# Shona Robison: Travel Dundee—That the Parliament notes with concern the actions of Travel Dundee in removing or reducing the bus services on certain routes in Dundee; believes that this reduction in service will affect many people without access to a car, particularly the elderly, and urges Travel Dundee to reconsider this decision as a matter of urgency. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan, Alex Neil, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Andrew Wilson, Irene McGugan
S1M-962# Travel Dundee (lodged on 6 June 2000) Fiona McLeod*, Richard Lochhead*
S1M-962# Travel Dundee (lodged on 6 June 2000) Mr Adam Ingram*, Tricia Marwick*, Mr Gil Paterson*

S1M-962# Shona Robison: Travel Dundee—That the Parliament notes with concern the actions of Travel Dundee in removing or reducing the bus services on certain routes in Dundee; believes that this reduction in service will affect many people without access to a car, particularly the elderly, and urges Travel Dundee to reconsider this decision as a matter of urgency. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan, Alex Neil, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Andrew Wilson, Irene McGugan, Fiona McLeod, Richard Lochhead, Mr Adam Ingram, Tricia Marwick, Mr Gil Paterson
S1M-962# Travel Dundee (lodged on 6 June 2000) Brian Adam*
